QuestData.Title: Go to the Front
QuestData.Description: Well, $n, I hope you're prepared for the next phase of our operation. The Legion never rests - and neither shall we! Take a gryphon and fly over to Honor Point - it's a small post near the Legion Front. $B$BSpeak with Field Marshal Brock. He'll have instructions for you when you arrive. Oh, and tell that pasty-faced shield-kisser I said 'hello'.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take a gryphon to Honor Point and speak with Field Marshal Brock.
QuestData.RewardText: Well met, $C. I'm glad that crusty old dwarf finally saw fit to send us some help!
